snippet.title: Bugaboo Pocket Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Bugaboo Pocket is a virtual pet game starring bugs! "Play as a research scientist helping a forest recover after a fire... Every pet is inspired by a real-world critter. Learn about their lifecycles, habitats, and food sources." https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985740/Bugaboo_Pocket/ #indiegames #bugs #tamagotchi
